meanings.definition: An image or representation of an ideal form.
meanings.sent1: In her mind, she held an eidola of a perfect garden.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted an eidola of a majestic mountain.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the eidola of a talking banana.
meanings.sent4: His eidola of success drove him to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The eidola of a peaceful meadow filled her thoughts.
